name: Be healthy (robertkiszeli)
description:
Tha main goal of the game is to get healthy by not eating unhealthy food and exercising (or to show how hard to do that).

If you move less you will grow. If you eat less unhealthy food you will not grow.

The background music and the sounds are from my previously downloaded assets.

https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/casual-music-pack/

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/pro-sound-collection-50235
